io.scanbot.sdk.persistence.fileio

Interface BaseFileIOProcessor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileIOProcessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AESEncryptedFileIOProcessor, EncryptedFileIOProcessor

    public BaseFileIOProcessor

    Represents base file IO operations
